statement_text: It feels like these viruses [mpox viruses] found the HOV lane by getting into sexual networks. I don’t think you can put it [the mpox outbreak] back into the box.

rationale: The metaphor 'don’t think you can put it back into the box' frames the difficulty of control alarmingly.
